title: Implement fish schooling behavior with flocking algorithm
description:
Add realistic fish movement patterns using boids-style flocking algorithm. Fish should exhibit cohesion, separation, and alignment behaviors when moving in schools.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Fish maintain proper spacing within schools
- Schools react to player movement and lure
- Performance optimized for multiple schools
- Configurable behavior parameters

title: Add depth-based lighting effects to sonar display
description:
Implement progressive darkening and color shift based on depth to enhance realism. Deeper waters should appear darker with blue-green color tones.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Smooth color transitions with depth changes
- Configurable depth-to-color mapping
- Performance impact < 5fps

title: Fix sonar artifact rendering at extreme depths
description:
When depth exceeds 100 feet, the sonar display shows visual artifacts and flickering. This appears to be a rendering pipeline issue with the Phaser graphics system.

**Steps to Reproduce:**
1. Start game and navigate to deep water area
2. Lower lure below 100 feet
3. Observe sonar display

**Expected:** Clean sonar rendering at all depths
**Actual:** Flickering and artifacts appear

title: Research particle system optimization strategies
description:
Investigate and document approaches to improve particle effect performance. Current implementation causes frame drops on lower-end hardware.

**Research Goals:**
- Benchmark current particle system performance
- Evaluate Phaser built-in optimizations
- Research object pooling strategies
- Compare with other fishing game implementations

**Deliverable:** Technical document with recommendations

title: Add seasonal weather effects system
description:
Implement dynamic weather system with seasonal variations including snow, rain, wind effects on ice and water surface.

**Features:**
- Snow particle effects for winter
- Rain effects for spring/fall
- Wind affecting ice surface
- Time-of-day integration

title: Improve lure physics and responsiveness
description:
Current lure movement feels unresponsive and unrealistic. Implement better physics model with water resistance, momentum, and drag.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Realistic acceleration/deceleration
- Water resistance based on depth
- Smooth line tension simulation
- Improved player feedback
